thread.title: Sunrun Announces Date and Conference Call Details for First Quarter 2018 Earnings Report

author: cnbc.com
title: Sunrun Announces Date and Conference Call Details for First Quarter 2018 Earnings Report
text:
Earnings Release and Conference Call Scheduled for May 9, 2018
SAN FRANCISCO, April 10, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sunrun (Nasdaq:RUN) today announced that it will issue its first quarter 2018 earnings report after the market closes Wednesday, May 9, 2018.
A conference call has been scheduled to discuss these earnings results at 2:30 p.m. Pacific Time. The conference call can be accessed live via the Sunrun Investor Relations website at http://investors.sunrun.com or over the phone by dialing (877) 470-1078 (domestic) or (615) 247-0087 (international) using ID #6696186. A replay will be available following the call via the Sunrun Investor Relations website or for one week at (855) 859-2056 (domestic) or (404) 537-3406 (international) using ID #6696186.
About Sunrun
Sunrun (Nasdaq:RUN) is the nation’s largest residential solar, storage and energy services company with a mission to create a planet run by the sun. Since establishing the solar as a service model in 2007, Sunrun leads the industry in providing clean energy to homeowners with little to no upfront cost and at a savings to traditional electricity. The company designs, installs, finances, insures, monitors and maintains the systems, while families receive predictable pricing for 20 years or more. The company also offers Sunrun Brightbox™ solar power generation with smart inverter technology and home battery storage. For more information, please visit: www.sunrun.com .
